short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Black people/African-Americans are humans. This chrome extension helps remind you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Black people/African-Americans are humans. This chrome extension helps remind you.

Replace each word that references someone from the African Diaspora with 'human being.' 

Please note: You may have to refresh your page a few times or wait for up to a minute for the results to appear. This was a quick project that will be iterated on if time allows- your mileage may vary! :D
